name: Ruff Rush
description:
As a little sausage your priorities include barking, chasing your tail, and chilling in the dog park.

But once you’re injected with an unknown serum, strange and baffling powers awaken in your doggy soul, leaving you with a special ability to build up a mighty pack of pooches, mutts and doggos to rein carnage on your local town.

Not only can you transform perfectly innocent bystanders into cute yet deadly doggies, but can also lead them to a better world where dogs rule.

Balance your varying team of doggos, each with a unique species and accompanied class - making the perilous task of taking down residents of your village, the army, and high-tech robots a world-ending, fast-based pack adventure.
